title: You guys are my family.
body:
It's been almost two months since I wrote my las thread. Truth is I was writing out a farewell post to all of you guys. For some reason I had lost all motivation when it came to writing threads and discussing in them. So I was leaving and doing it with this huge thread detailing my feelings on the positive state of narrative and a big mopey farewell were I listed  and thanked everyone that had made story and art a welcoming place for me and many others. But then as I wrote down the list I realized I could never abandon these people. You guys are like family to me.

So **FUCK THAT SHIT**. I'm never leaving motherfuckers so if you guys would be so kind as to get me up to date over what has been going on here over the past two moths it would be greatly appreciated. 

Also just for kicks I'm posting the list. So in a way this is a thank you but not a farewell.

NAMELESSHERO
Thank you for teaching me to ignore whiners and trolls.

333LOM
Hi there my fellow acolyte. Keep up the good work in factions.

SHARJO
Faster than Hecarim with Homeguards, the Hermes of Story and Art, thank you for keeping us up to date with any news that may come our way.

IMPETUAL
Even though you rustle my jimmies you bring up some pretty good points. Just take that stick out of your butt and I think you’ll do just fine.

DEXTIX LT
Same as with Impetiual, also I don’t think Riot firing all of its writers will make them write faster, just saying bruh.

TESLA EFFECT
Both the voice of reason and criticism.

GREENLORE
A true veteran worthy of many a medal.

RIOT BIOLUMINISCENCE
Always there for us, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

RIOT JAREDAN
Just check in a bit more often alright? 

RIOT NARSIL
Thank you for keeping me hopeful when I needed hope the most.
